alert.note: Alert for Ballard; Carlisle; Fulton; Hickman (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 12:49PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Pulaski, southeastern Alexander, Fulton, Carlisle, Hickman, southern Ballard, Mississippi and southeastern Scott Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1148 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bertrand to near Anniston to Towosahgy State Historic Site to near Clayton. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Wyatt around 1200 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Wickliffe, Cayce, Horseshoe Lake Conservation Area, Cairo, Clinton, Bardwell, Mounds, Mound City, Fulgham, Barlow and La Center. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 1 and 12. Interstate 57 in Missouri between Mile Markers 3 and 21. Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 1 and 8. Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 70 and 71. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
